rows.label: tev035401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Capsica about the weather on Mira.

rows.label: tev035401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Capsica about the Enemy Index.

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0001
rows.name:
I got a very good look at Mira when we made our
emergency landing, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Wild rivers that are as red as sunsets?
Great plains with ground as white as snow?
This planet is full of many wondrous vistas, is it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0003
rows.name:
I can't wait for a chance to feast my eyes on all
the new indigens and materials just waiting to be
discovered, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you head to the far far north of New LA,
you might even be able to explore those areas now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Some of Mira's weather has adverse effects on the
body, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0021
rows.name:
But there are augments on the market now that mitigate
or nullify the weather, aren't there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0022
rows.name:
And while they may be expensive, you can't put a price
on life, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0025
rows.name:
Those comm devices you carry around have something
called an an Enemy Index on them, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0026
rows.name:
And that index tells you what indigens you'll meet
where, as well as what kind of materials you can get
from them, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035401_MSG0027
rows.name:
I am so jealous. I wish I had that kind of information
at my fingertips, you know?[ST:wait ]
